target.name: help
target.echo:
This patch will allow for LexEVS (version 5.1 and up) to load the updated UMLS RRF files via the LexEVS UMLS and Meta loaders.
Run the command `ant build` from the top level directory of this project. The resulting patch jar will be located in `dist/lbPatch.jar`. Copy this jar to the `runtime/` directory of a LexEVS installation.
